scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist/holisticon/account/resources/css/ && mkdir -p dist/holisticon/email/ && mkdir -p dist/holisticon/ && cp -R src/holisticon/ dist/holisticon && cp package.json dist/holisticon/
scripts.build:assets:images: mkdir -p dist/holisticon/email/resources/vendor/images && mkdir -p dist/holisticon/login/resources/vendor/images && cp -R src/images/ dist/holisticon/email/resources/vendor/images && cp -R src/images/ dist/holisticon/login/resources/vendor/images
scripts.build:assets:fonts: mkdir -p dist/holisticon/email/resources/vendor/fonts && mkdir -p dist/holisticon/login/resources/vendor/fonts && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ dist/holisticon/email/resources/vendor/fonts && cp -R node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ dist/holisticon/login/resources/vendor/fonts
scripts.build:sass: mkdir -p dist/holisticon/account/resources/css && mkdir -p dist/holisticon/login/resources/css && npm-run-all build:sass:fonts build:sass:base build:sass:elements build:sass:elements-ie6 build:sass:elements-ie7 build:sass:elements-ie8
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:end2end
scripts.test:end2end: jasmine-node --junit test/end2end/ && mkdir -p target && mv junitresults.xml target/
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/holisticon && npm i
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release && npm run version-and-push
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags
